p: The pharmacist’s job aims to protect public health and includes the provision of pharmaceutical care services. Pharmacists are highly qualified specialists in the field of healthcare. Practising the profession of a pharmacist in Poland requires obtaining a master’s degree in pharmacy. Pharmacy studies last 5 years. Additionally, at least 6 months of professional apprenticeship is necessary to practice the profession of pharmacist. Foreign diplomas must be recognized as equivalent to a diploma and a master’s degree in pharmacy from the Republic of Poland. The pharmacist (pharmacist) has a statutory continuous training obligation.
